entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of ias_1_role-210000_reported_2 but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:Goodwill All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of ias_1_role-310000_reported_1 but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests, ifrs-full:RevenueFromInterest, ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent, ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9626] It is expected that ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent with a value of 122,656,000 reported in the network role https://www.kogeneracja.com.pl/role/Ias_1_role-310000_reported_1 should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ComprehensiveIncome with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParentMember and a reported value of 122,674,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role https://www.kogeneracja.com.pl/role/Ias_1_role-610000_reported_5. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
Period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : PLN Decimals of ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent : -3 Decimals of ComprehensiveIncome : -3 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900IIZX8UAI8MJ703/2021-12-31/ESEF/PL/0/KOGENERACJA-2021-12-31.zip/KOGENERACJA-2021-12-31/reports/KOGENERACJA-2021-12-31.xhtml 2685

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9628] It is expected that ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests with a value of 2,019,000 reported in the network role https://www.kogeneracja.com.pl/role/Ias_1_role-310000_reported_1 should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ComprehensiveIncome with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:NoncontrollingInterestsMember and a reported value of 2,001,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role https://www.kogeneracja.com.pl/role/Ias_1_role-610000_reported_5. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests fact are:
Period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : PLN Decimals of ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests : -3 Decimals of ComprehensiveIncome : -3 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900IIZX8UAI8MJ703/2021-12-31/ESEF/PL/0/KOGENERACJA-2021-12-31.zip/KOGENERACJA-2021-12-31/reports/KOGENERACJA-2021-12-31.xhtml 2698
